    Convenient method for BitSet manipulations

    • Method Detail

      • hasAtLeastOneBitSet

        public static boolean hasAtLeastOneBitSet(BitSet bitSet,
                                          Iterable<Integer> indexes)
        Returns true if at least one bit on a given position is set.
        Parameters:
        bitSet - the BitSet to modify
        indexes - the index positions to check
        Returns:
        true if BitSet contains at least one bit at any position from index which is set, otherwise returns false

      • hasAllBitsSet

        public static boolean hasAllBitsSet(BitSet bitSet,
                                    Iterable<Integer> indexes)
        Returns true if all bits at given indexes are set.
        Parameters:
        bitSet - the BitSet to modify
        indexes - the index positions to check
        Returns:
        true if BitSet all bits at given indexes are set. otherwise returns false
